thread.section_title: US Stock Market News - Dow Jones, Nasdaq, S&P 500 | Reuters.com
thread.title: Amber Road Reports Q4 Loss Per Share $0.07

author: Reuters Editorial
title: Amber Road Reports Q4 Loss Per Share $0.07
text:
Feb 15 (Reuters) - Amber Road Inc:
* AMBER ROAD ANNOUNCES FOURTH QUARTER AND FULL YEAR 2017 FINANCIAL RESULTS
* Q4 ADJUSTED NON-GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.00
* Q4 GAAP LOSS PER SHARE $0.07 * QUARTERLY TOTAL REVENUE WAS $20.6 MILLION, AN INCREASE COMPARED TO $19.2 MILLION
* SEES Q1 NON-GAAP NET LOSS PER SHARE $0.08 - $0.10
* SEES ‍Q1 REVENUE UNDER ASC 606 OF $19.6 MILLION - $20.2 MILLION & UNDER ASC 605 OF $20.3 MILLION- $ 20.9 MILLION​
* SEES FY 2018 NON-GAAP NET LOSS PER SHARE $0.19 - $0.29
* SEES ‍2018 REVENUE UNDER ASC 606 OF $84 MILLION - $87 MILLION & UNDER ASC 605 OF $86 MILLION - $89 MILLION
* Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $-0.05, REVENUE VIEW $20.4 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $-0.06, REVENUE VIEW $20.4 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* FY2018 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $-0.17, REVENUE VIEW $86.8 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
